abstract: The Dow recovered some of its big losses on Monday after oil prices retreated, but the broader stock market remained mixed as financial stocks continued to tumble.
snippet: The Dow recovered some of its big losses on Monday after oil prices retreated, but the broader stock market remained mixed as financial stocks continued to tumble.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average on Monday recovered from some of Friday’s big losses after oil prices retreated, but the broader stock market remained mixed as financial stocks continued to tumble.

headline.main: Stocks Are Steadier, but Analysts Are Cautious
headline.print_headline: STOCKS AND BONDS: Dow Bounces Up, but Financials Slide
